Desc.entry: Provides full instruction for skiing and snowboarding at all levels. Facilities include restaurant bar, Alpine Suite, shops, corporate and social entertainment, toboggan run and children's birthday parties. Includes Adventure Mountain outdoor play area for children, offering fun and adventure, a state of the art ten pin bowling alley and quad bikes. Also has a restaurant and bar. New indoor play area "Jungle Jims". Special events include Play all Day, holiday acaemies and airbag sessions.
